amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the 340B Contract Pharmacy Protection Act:
(1) 340B drug means a drug that a 340B entity may purchase at a reduced price pursuant to 42 U.S.C. 256b, as such section existed on January 1, 2025;
(2) 340B entity means a covered entity as defined in 42 U.S.C. 256b(a)(4), as such section existed on January 1, 2025; and
(3) Manufacturer has the same meaning as in section 71-7438.
